Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service was unable to obtain the session token from the session id: %1 (%2). Please verify that Terminal Services client is installed and the service is running under the LocalSystem user.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service was unable to obtain access to Terminal Services: %1 (%2). Please verify that the Terminal Services client is installed and the service is running under the LocalSystem user.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Could not obtain a lock on local policy settings for update detection, %1 (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Could not update keyboard filter subsystem, %1 (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service could not start session monitor. The session monitor ensures keyboard layout changes are reflected within the service and that on-screen keyboards work correctly. Check to make sure system permissions are set up correctly. Reason, %1 (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Session Manager handle to Keyboard Filter process was abandoned. Handle will be removed from the session list.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service failed to launch hook process. Reason: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: 'sdbinst -q (%1)' has probably failed, exit code of (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SdbPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ExitCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Unsupported (e.g. remote) session was disconnected by Keyboard Filter Service.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Keyboard Filter Driver could not start and has unloaded. Reason, %1 (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Driver could not attach to keyboard. Reason, %1 (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Driver could not properly filter keystroke information. Reason, %1 (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Driver could not update filter configuration. Reason, %1 (%2).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Reason" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: A non-empty list of keyboard filter rules resulted in an empty scancode list.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Error was returned when trying to transform a keyboard filter rule to a scancode.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Attempting to launch the keyboard filter hook process.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to attach session %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to detach session %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Missing Breakout keycode
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: IOCTLReadBreakoutKeyFailed %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: CreateResources failed %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: RPC initialization failed %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: BreakoutKey thread launch failure %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Run failed while waiting on handles %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Set KeyboardLayout failed %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: RegisterDeviceNotification failed %1 (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Message" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service has Started
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service has stopped
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: Generic Keyboard Filter Service message: %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Command" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: 'sdbinst -q (%1)' executed, exit code (%2)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SdbPath" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ExitCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Administrator user %1 is now logged on, keyboard filtering is disabled for this session.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: User %1 logged off. Keyboard filtering is disabled for the Windows Logon Screen.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: User %1 logged off. Keyboard filtering is disabled.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: User %1 is now logged on. Keyboard filtering is now in effect.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="UserName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service has detected Policy changes and is reloading them
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service has detected a layout change to %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Layout" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service has found the following enabled policies.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Policy" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string" count="Count"/> </template>

Event.Message: The Keyboard Filter Service is sending scancodes to the Filter Driver.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Count" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <struct name="KeyData" count="Count"> <data name="Modifiers" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Extended" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Scancode" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> </struct> </template>

Event.Message: A custom filter (%1) appears to have an invalid modifier (system) key. Valid modifiers include Ctrl or Control, Alt, Shift, and Win or Windows. Each key must be separated from the one that follows with a plus (+).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Filter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A custom filter (%1) appears to have an invalid key. Keys can be any character on the system's keyboard or it's name. Please see documentation for the names of all valid keys.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Filter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: A custom filter (%1) appears to be invalid. A valid filter has zero or more modifiers, and a single key. Each modifier and key must be separated by (+).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Filter" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Too many custom filters have been enabled. No more than %1 custom and fixed filters may be defined.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Maximum" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Hardware keyboard input
Software keyboard input
Software keyboard input

Load Configuration

Keybaord Layout Change
